Get all the llamas.

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Llamas

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"Name (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 100 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"title":"Name","description":"The name of the llama. This must be unique across all llamas.","examples":["libby the llama","labby the llama"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"age"} required={true} schemaName={"Age (integer)"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","title":"Age","description":"The age of the llama in years.","examples":[5,6,7]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"color"} required={true} schemaName={"LlamaColor (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`brown`, `white`, `black`, `gray`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["brown","white","black","gray"],"title":"LlamaColor","description":"The color of a llama."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"rating"} required={true} schemaName={"Rating (integer)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 5`"} schema={{"type":"integer","maximum":5,"minimum":1,"title":"Rating","description":"The rating of the llama from 1 to 5.","examples":[1,2,3,4,5]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"llamaId"} required={true} schemaName={"Llama Id (integer)"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","title":"Llama Id","description":"The ID of the llama.","examples":[1]}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"name\": \"string\",\n    \"age\": 0,\n    \"color\": \"brown\",\n    \"rating\": 0,\n    \"llamaId\": 0\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>
